Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 13 Piṭṭhiduka » 13.11 Kāmāvacaraduka » 13.11.7 Pañhāvāra » 13.11.7.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 13.11.7.2.1 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Piṭṭhiduka
Kāmāvacaraduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
223.
4578Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, na sahajāte cha, naaññamaññe cha, nanissaye cha, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte cha…pe…  nasampayutte cha, navippayutte pañca, noatthiyā pañca, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate pañca.
